message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $120 to us. Considering its quality and unique features, I would like to propose a price of $150 for it. This price reflects our commitment to providing high-quality products and services. I look forward to your response.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but based on my research and needs, I am looking to stay within a budget of $120. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.
